cells.english: Amen, Amen, come
My faithful Lord, Jesus Christ!
Amen, Amen, come
Our hearts are yearning for the flight!
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
We see Thy glory,
In the delightful clouds,
You've made us like you,
In a quick twinkle of an eye.
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
The sight would cheer us,
We see Thy wounds and thy scars;
As You draw near us,
Signs of Your love fill our eyes.
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
Around our Groom there
We rejoice and be glad,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Nafrah wa naskun fee kull heen
cells.arabic: نفرح ونكون معك في كل حين

cells.english: With the redeemed church,
The greatest love and joy ever.
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
No more sorrow,
No more pain, nor tears,
The Lord our comfort,
Our hearts and souls He cheers,
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
There shall be no night,
No candle needed nor a sun,
Our Lord and Savior
Gives us Himself, the True Light.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya helw ya tayyib ya ameen
cells.arabic: يا حلو يا طيب يا أمين

cells.english: We're waiting for you
As you have promised
Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life (x2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Kun ameenan ila al-mawt fa sa'oteek ikleel al-hayat
cells.arabic: كن أميناً إلى الموت فسأعطيك إكليل الحياة

cells.english: Soon I come, soon I come, soon I come as the thief!
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati saree'an ha ana aati kal-liss
cells.arabic: ها أنا آت سريعاً ها أنا آت كلص

cells.english: And I will give him who thirsts from the water of life
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati al-atshan min yanboo' maa' al-hayat
cells.arabic: ها أنا أعطي العطشان من ينبوع ماء الحياة

cells.english: He who overcomes shall eat, from the tree of life
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Man yaghlib sayakul min shajarat al-hayat
cells.arabic: من يغلب سيأكل من شجرة الحياة

cells.english: The tree, in the midst of the Lord´s paradise (x2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Shajarat qaimah fee wasat firdaws Allah
cells.arabic: شجرة قائمة في وسط فردوس الله

cells.english: Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life (x2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Kun ameenan ila al-mawt fa sa'oteek ikleel al-hayat
cells.arabic: كن أميناً إلى الموت فسأعطيك إكليل الحياة

cells.english: Soon I come, soon I come, soon I come as the thief!
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati saree'an ha ana aati kal-liss
cells.arabic: ها أنا آت سريعاً ها أنا آت كلص

cells.english: And I will give him who thirsts from the water of life
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati al-atshan min yanboo' maa' al-hayat
cells.arabic: ها أنا أعطي العطشان من ينبوع ماء الحياة

cells.english: He who overcomes and keeps my words till the end
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Man yaghlib wa yahfath lil-nihayah a'mali

cells.english: I will give power to rule nations with an iron rod (x2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Sultan sa'oteeh limalik kull ma li
cells.arabic: سلطاناً سأعطيه ليملك كل ما لي

cells.english: Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life (x2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Kun ameenan ila al-mawt fa sa'oteek ikleel al-hayat
cells.arabic: كن أميناً إلى الموت فسأعطيك إكليل الحياة

cells.english: Soon I come, soon I come, soon I come as the thief!
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati saree'an ha ana aati kal-liss
cells.arabic: ها أنا آت سريعاً ها أنا آت كلص

cells.english: And I will give him who thirsts from the water of life
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati al-atshan min yanboo' maa' al-hayat
cells.arabic: ها أنا أعطي العطشان من ينبوع ماء الحياة

cells.english: He who overcomes shall not be hurt by the second death
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Man yaghlib a'taraf bihi qadam abi
cells.arabic: من يغلب أعترف به قدام أبي

cells.english: His name, his name, before my Father I confess (x2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Man yaghlib fala yo'zihi thak al-mawt al-thani
cells.arabic: من يغلب فلا يؤذيه ذاك الموت السني

cells.english: Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life (x2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Kun ameenan ila al-mawt fa sa'oteek ikleel al-hayat
cells.arabic: كن أميناً إلى الموت فسأعطيك إكليل الحياة

cells.arabic: ها أنا أعطي العطشان من ينبوع ماء الحياة

cells.english: He who overcomes I will write on him my new name
He who overcomes shall sit with me on my throne (x2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Yawma urs lil-kharouf yawma majd fee al-sama'
cells.arabic: يوم عرس للخروف يوم مجد في السماء

cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati al-atshan min yanboo' maa' al-hayat
