cells.english: Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
Your glory O Mary
is above the heavens.
You gave birth to the Savior
He gave you all honor. (x2)
Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
Your glory O Mary
exceeded the heavenlies.
You’re exalted above the cherubim
and above the seraphim. (x2)
Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
Your glory O Mary
shines in the highest,
for you are the Mother of God
who came and redeemed us. (x2)
Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
Your glory O Mary
is over all generation.
You are the second heaven,
Mother of the Great King
Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
In celebrating your Martyrs, the righteous and saints!
cells.arabic: في عيد شهدائك عيد شهدائك الابرار القديسين

cells.english: Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
Their blood was shed for their faith in our God and savior
cells.enPhonicsSongs: El-dam sal lama sal anhar dam el-shohada
cells.arabic: الدم سال ياما سال انهار دم الشهداء

cells.english: Jesus Christ! Jesus Christ! Jesus Christ!
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Dam al-abrar, dam al-at-har, dam al-abtal
cells.arabic: دم الابرار دم الاطهار دم الابطال

cells.english: Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
In the Nayrouz, commemorating your saintly Martyrs!
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Fi el-Nayrouz el-Nayrouz zekra el-shohada al-qaddisin
cells.arabic: فى النيروز النيروز ذكرى الشهداء القديسين

cells.english: Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
O God our Lord, keep us in your faith and in your love
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya Rabb e7faz lena imanena wa e7faz lena batrakena
cells.arabic: يا رب احفظ لينا ايمانا واحفظ لينا بطركنا

cells.english: Forever! and ever! and ever!
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
O God our Lord, protect our pope and our beloved church
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya Rabb e7faz lena imanena wa e7faz lena batrakena
cells.arabic: يا رب احفظ لينا ايمانا واحفظ لينا بطركنا

cells.english: Forever! and ever! and ever!
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
No don't leave me alone, O my faithful shepherd.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: La la tatrukni wahdi ya ra'i al-ameen
cells.arabic: لا لا تتركني وحدي يا راعي الأمين

cells.english: Guide me dear master and be unto me a helper.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Qudni anta Rabbi wa sir ma'ee ya mu'een
cells.arabic: قدني أنت ربي وسر معي يا معين

cells.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
cells.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

cells.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
cells.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

cells.english: And don't leave me alone in the midst of this darkness
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Wa la tatrukni wahdi fee wasat al-zalam
cells.arabic: ولا تتركني وحدي في وسط الظلام

cells.english: Let your bright face guide me O Lord unto peace.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ij'al wajhak yaqooduni ya Rab lil-salaam
cells.arabic: إجعل وجهك يقودني يا رب للسلام

cells.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
cells.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

cells.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
cells.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

cells.english: And don't leave me alone but hear my prayers
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Wa la tatrukni wahdi bal isma' salati
cells.arabic: ولا تتركني وحدي بل اسمع صلاتي

cells.english: And be there for me redeemer for the rest of my life
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Waqif anta bijanibi Rabbi kul hayati
cells.arabic: وقف أنت بجانبي ربي كل حياتي

cells.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
cells.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

cells.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
cells.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

cells.english: And don't leave me alone because of my sins
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Wa la tatrukni wahdi min ajl khatayaya
cells.arabic: ولا تتركني وحدي من أجل خطاياي

cells.english: But forgive me O lord and accept my repentance
cells.arabic: بل سامحني يا ربي إن زلت قدماي

cells.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
cells.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

cells.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
cells.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

cells.english: No don't leave me alone in the midst of this world
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Wa la tatrukni wahdi fee wasat al-khata
cells.arabic: ولا تتركني وحدي في وسط الخطاة

cells.english: But Come quickly O Lord and take me to heaven
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Bal ta'al ya Rabbi wakhudhni lil-sama
cells.arabic: بل تعال يا ربي وخذني للسما

cells.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
cells.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

cells.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
cells.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

english_title: Draw a portrait of the Virgin

cells.english: Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
carrying her Son the Christ.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
offer unto her the praise.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
draw it with the brightest colors.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for she is the source of gentleness.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
that is ornamented with rubies.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son defeated death.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and adorn her with priceless treasures.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son, He is the way.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
frame it with the precious stones.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
so the Light of our faith shines.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
with her crown of sacred pearls.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
the mother of the Kings of ages.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
shroud her with the purest diamonds
Put her on a beautiful icon,
one from which the devil flees.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and engrave her on the wood.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
mother of the Lord of lords.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
on the wooden olive branch.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
the Virgin who lights our eyes.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
decorate her O wise virgins.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
mother of the Alpha and the Omega.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.

english_title: Hail to You O Mary, Mother of the Holy God
arabic_title: السلام لكِ يا مريم، أم الله القدوس

cells.english: Hail to you O Mary,
O Mother of the Holy God.
Hail to you O Mary,
O true Virgin and Bride.
Hail to you O Mary,
The ark of the covenant.
Hail to you O Mary,
Fruit of the sweetest scent.
Hail to you O Mary,
O heaven and paradise.
Hail to you O Mary,
Who carried Jesus Christ.
Hail to you O Mary,
O friend of Solomon.
Hail to you O Mary,
O helper of every one.
Hail to you O Mary,
The blessed Virgin.
Hail to you O Mary,
The hope of all Christians.
Hail to you O Mary,
O pure and chosen seed.
Hail to you O Mary,
Who's from all evil freed.
Hail to you O Mary,
On whose prayers we depend.
Hail to you O Mary,
Who teaches sinners to repent.
Hail to you O Mary,
A light in the wilderness.
Hail to you O Mary,
Undefiled innocence.
Hail to you O Mary,
With glory shining bright.
Hail to you O Mary,
O Bride of the holy Light.
Hail to you O Mary,
So dear and so precious.
Hail to you O Mary,
So honest and gracious.
Hail to you O Mary,
The strength of all fighters.
Hail to you O Mary,
Most blessed of God's treasures.
Hail to you O Mary,
Tablets of the new Covenant.
Hail to you O Mary,
To the needy you lend a hand.
Hail to you O Mary,
O blessed and pure seed.
Hail to you O Mary,
O hailed and true creed.
Hail to you O Mary,
O God's sanctuary.
Hail to you O Mary,
Who befits Him in glory.
Hail to you O Mary,
O pure and beautiful stone.
Hail to you O Mary,
Among flowers you stand alone.
The mention of Your name is on
all the believers’ mouths.
They all say, “O God of
the Virgin Mary. Help all of us.”

english_title: Hail to You O Mary, O fair dove who is calling
arabic_title: السلام لكِ يا مريم، يا يمامة جليلة تصيح

cells.english: Hail to you, O Mary,
O fair dove who is calling
With a voice full of rejoicing
Of a great mystery announcing.
Hail to you, O vine,
Whose fruitful branches blossom
With exalted understanding,
The beginning of the spring of wisdom.
Hail to the hidden vessel
Before the beginning of time,
Containing the Light of Light
In the Father’s bosom at all times.
Hail to you, O hidden treasure,
Carrying all mysteries.
Through you, the promise was fulfilled
To all the pure forefathers.
Hail to you, O tabernacle
Of the patriarch Abraham,
A hidden wisdom was revealed
That perplexed all wisdom.
Hail to the spring of Isaac,
Watering the fruitful plant.
Hail to the bright dawn,
Shining in a wasteland.
Hail to the joy of Jacob
All of the blessings’ root,
And the comfort of all people;
Through her, the curse was removed.
Hail to the famous field
With a gem in its midst,
Joseph found it so pure,
Surpassing all treasures.
O pure and chaste field
Whose Creator is in its midst,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: wa fi wastahu khaaliq laa yura

cells.english: To whom is majesty and might,
Who made the ashamed righteous.
Hail to Noah’s ark,
And the star, early and bright.
Your shining is the coming dawn
For all creatures, their light.
O the untilled field,
Which no man has planted,
Its planting was watered
Through the Holy Spirit.
Hail to the created one
Whose Creator is in her womb.
By His hands she was made
And of her, He was born.
Bless you, whose mystery
Is exalted, amazing, and awesome.
My mind is perplexed,
Along with all those of wisdom.
How bright is your light,
Shining for those in darkness.
Satan has deceived your servant,
Making him deserve Hades.
Therefore, woe to me,
Life passed by, I did not perceive,
The Vinedresser paid the laborers
But no wage did I receive.
Winter and summer have passed,
I did not attain salvation;
The time of reaping has come,
I am still bound by temptation.
O Mother, throne, and Virgin,
The hope of those without hope,
I entreat your Son’s forgiveness,
Not to be on the left-side.
I delayed in my trading,
My talent became useless;
I came at the eleventh hour
Hoping to receive wages.
I desire you on Judgment Day
To heal my wounds with your power.
The time of my departure is near
In that bitter hour.
Help me, I am in bondage,
O Virgin, I belong to your goodness.
Crown me with victory,
Grant me tomorrow’s wages.
Along with all Christians,
I ask for peace and salvation.
Your intercession we seek,
O intercessor of all creation.
The mention of your name,
Is in all the believers’ mouths,
They all say, “O God of the Virgin Mary,
Help all of us.”

english_title: Hail to you O Mother of Comfort

cells.english: Hail to you O Mother of Comfort
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Salamna elekee ya om el ma3oona

cells.english: O pure rampart of salvation O compassionate mother (x2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya tahra ya soor el khalas ya 7anoona
cells.arabic: يا طاهره يا سور الخلاص يا حنونه

cells.english: It is always our pleasure to praise your virtues
and turn always to you seeking your help.
Who among the people whose heart is more merciful
cells.arabic: مين في البشر قلبه أحنى علينا

cells.english: and whose passions support us in all our life steps. (x2)
Who truly rejoice if we rejoice
and is saddened if we are sad.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: We ye7zan eza el7ozn geh nawa7eena
cells.arabic: و يحزن إذا الحزن جه نواحينا

cells.english: Matthias the Lord's apostle during his imprisonment
cells.enPhonicsSongs: We metias rasool elmasee7 wa’t segno

cells.english: you asked on his behalf before the Almighty God. (x2)
An amazing thing happened the steel melted
cells.arabic: حصل أمر هايل بقي الصلب سايل

cells.english: and your intercession brought peace and safety for him.
He asked for your intercession our father Anba Abraam ibn Zaraa
And his prayers were answered quickly and greatly. (x2)
You delivered him out of distress and moved the Mount of Makatam
with the greatest miracle recorded in history.
cells.arabic: بآيه لها في التاريخ أي روعة

cells.english: At the church of Zeitun you blessed us
cells.enPhonicsSongs: We lamma kona fee keneeset elzatoon barekteena
cells.arabic: ولما كنا في كنيسة الزيتون باركتينا

cells.english: and we felt peace and great joy in us. (x2)
You brought to the sick heavenly healing
and to the sad souls great comfort.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
She has born unto us,
the Savior of the world.
He came and saved our souls,
And forgave us our sins.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
She's the lady and the Virgin,
Our queen in heaven.
She's above the Cherubim,
And praised by the Seraphim.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
She is famous and well known,
As the best shelter to rest.
Try her and you'll find that,
For your help she's always there.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Please O Mary, pray for us
And the sinners to return.
Teach us and guide all of us,
For you are the faithful saint.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
My soul is troubled in the deep,
And my eyes are full of tears,
Now I remember you indeed,
For your salvation is near.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
All the waves came upon me,
I was drowned in the deep sea,
I asked for help where it could be,
But in the hands of my Lord dear.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
My heart is trembling in great fear,
And my head is wrapped in weeds,
Out of the depth I cried to Thee,
Save my soul and set me free.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
God ordered the whale in the sea,
To safely drop Jonah in peace,
In the whale's belly Jonah kneeled,
And thanked the Lord for His great deed.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
How could I forget, the One who died for me
How could I forget His side that had to bleed
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Kayfa ansa dam dhi al-janb al-jareeh
cells.arabic: كيف آنسي دم ذي الجنب الجريح

cells.english: He who saw me in my misery so He came running to meet me
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Man raani fee hawani fa'ata taw'an ilayya
cells.arabic: من راني في هواني فآتى طوعا آلي

cells.english: He who bought me and redeemed me broke my chains and set me free
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Man fadayni washtarani kasiran qayd yadi
cells.arabic: من فدانى واشتراني كاسرا قيد يدي

cells.english: How could I forget your kindness through the years
Your right hand always reaching out to me
In my joys and in my sorrows, in all of life's storms
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Waqt huzni wa waqt deeqi wasat amwaj al-hayat
cells.arabic: وقت حزني وقت ضيقي وسط أمواج الحياة

cells.english: You've become my friend and fortress, You are the One to whom I call
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Surt hisni wa rafeeqi surt lee bab al-najat
cells.arabic: صرت حصني ورفيقي صرت لي باب النجاة

cells.english: Help me Lord I want to lose myself in You
All my pride has blinded me from seeing You
So I'll keep watching and praying setting my eyes on You
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ughni fee hayati aaliman anni ghareeb
cells.arabic: أغنى في حياتي عالما آني غريب

cells.english: Trusting in your sure promises that You will be there for me soon
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Dhakiran annaka rabbi sawfa ta'ti an qareeb
cells.arabic: ذاكرا انك ربى سوف تأتى عن قريب

cells.english: How lovely it is to get together
In love our Lord teaches us
When two meet in my name together
I will always be in between their gather
O Lord come now and join us here
We ask you to come and give us cheer
Fill us with joy from your Holy Spirit
And peace no riches can provide
The Lord is here always with us
How lovely he is, how content we are
We talk to him and he always listens
He'll always be with us in us
O Lord come now and join us here
We ask you to come and give us cheer
Fill us with joy from your Holy Spirit
And peace no riches can provide
O Lord come now and join us here
We ask you to come and give us cheer
Fill us with joy from your Holy Spirit
And peace no riches can provide

english_title: How Sweet You Are O Mary
arabic_title: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك
audio_file: How Beautiful You Are O Mary

cells.english: How sweet you are O Mary.
cells.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك

cells.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
You carried the redeemer of the world.
You gave birth to the Creator of the world.
You nursed the Lord of the creation.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
How sweet you are O Mary.
cells.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك

cells.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
You became the mother of your creator.
How can I describe your meanings?
He is your Son and your Redeemer.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
How sweet you are O Mary.
cells.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاكِ

cells.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
Ask and intercede for us O Virgin
before your Lord, the Almighty God.
Your intercession will give us victory.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
How sweet you are O Mary.
cells.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك

cells.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
You are a treasure of grace, O my mother the Virgin.
I praise you, O my pure lady.
Your praises and comfort and triumph.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
How sweet you are O Mary.
cells.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك

cells.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2

english_title: I Can Hear My Savior Calling

cells.english: I can hear my Savior calling
Take the cross and follow, follow me.
Where He leads me I will follow
I will go, with Him all the way
If He leads me to crucifixion
I will go, with Him all the way
If He leads me to the judgment
I will go, with Him all the way
If in war or in peace
I will go, with Him all the way
If in health or in sickness
I will go, with Him all the way
If I am beaten or afflicted
I will go, with Him all the way
If in jail or in chains
I will go, with Him all the way
He will lead me to grace and glory
I will go, with Him all the way
I place my soul into your hands
My Lord Jesus Christ
Lead me because I depend on you
Lead me and I´ll serve you
Please be my guide in everyway
Be my guard I won´t go astray
Sanctify my heart and my needs
Until I see you Lord
As you have always said
All sorts of all goodness
"Come unto me all you weary
Come unto me and you will find rest
Come unto me I am the way
I am the truth and life"
When my life gets filled with worries
And darkness overwhelms
The clouds will be dispersed away
By you, O prince of peace
You are my shield you are my hope
You are my strengths you are my go
You are the perfect love, O Lord
Of whom then shall I fear!
As you have always said
All sorts of all goodness
"Come unto me all you weary
Come unto me and you will find rest
Come unto me I am the way
I am the truth and life"
When worries overwhelm my life
Or darkness closes in
The clouds will be dispersed away
By you, O prince of peace
The Lord is my shield, my hope
The Lord will do as He has said
His love is complete, O Lord
So I see you, Lord Jesus
As you have always said
All sorts of all goodness
"Come unto me all you weary
Come unto me and you will find rest
Come unto me I am the way
I am the truth and life"
I praise the Virgin: And explain and say: O the origin: And the hidden pearl
cells.arabic: أمدح فى البتول: وأشرح فيها وأقول: ياأصل الأصول: ياجوهر مكنون

cells.english: Through your Son, our Lady: Cause of salvation: We reached the goal: And you brought us joy
cells.arabic: بأبنك ياستنا: خلاص جنسنا: وبلغنا المنى: وبك صرنا فرحون

cells.english: Was truly Incarnate: From a Virgin girl: Crucified and died: For us at Golgotha
cells.arabic: تجسد الابن بثبات: من ست البنات: صلب عنا ومات: عند الاقرانيون

cells.english: The fruit of my pledge: O daughter of Zion: To love your Son: And proclaim and say
cells.arabic: ثمرة عربونى: ياأبنة صهيون: أحب الهي: وأصيح وأقول

cells.english: Gabriel came: With tidings and sayings: You accepted His word: In calmness and wisdom
cells.arabic: جاك غبريال: ببشائر وأقوال: وقبلت ما قال: بسر خفي مكنون

cells.english: He dwelt by His Word: In strength and power: You became like heaven: O, daughter of Zion
cells.arabic: حل بكلمته: وشرح قدرته: صرت كسمائه: يا إبنة صهيون

cells.english: Your love embraced me: O pride of nations: Moses has seen you: Surprise and marvel: And the lamps are bright: With golden crosses. Moses' dome, O Mary: O Aaron's censer
cells.arabic: سباني حُبك: يافخرَ الرتب: موسى رآكِ: عجب من عجب: والقناديل فضة بتضوي: والصلبان ذهب : ياقبة موسى يامريم: ياشورية هرون

cells.english: He saved Adam: After his sorrow: And has freed the world: We rejoice in you
cells.arabic: إبنك خلص آدم: بعد أن كان نادم: وعتق العالم: ونحن بك فرحون

cells.english: He is glorified: And promised His Apostles: To save His people: From Satan's bondage
cells.arabic: دائم تمجيده: وعاهد تلاميذه: يخلص عبيده: من كيد الأركون

cells.english: Concerning you, David said,: “The King rejoiced in you: And took flesh from you: The Lord on His Throne.”
cells.arabic: داود قال عنك: الملك إشتهى حسنك: وتجسد منك: رب العرش المكنون

cells.english: Myriads and thousands: Standing around the Throne: Ranks and orders: Saints and martyrs
cells.arabic: ربوات وألوف: حول العرش وقوف: وطغمات وصفوف: وشهداء متصلون

cells.english: Sorrow was taken away: And we are comforted: Through you, O Mary: The pride of the human race
cells.arabic: زالت عنا الأحزان وصرنا فى أطمئنان بك يامريم يا فخر البشريون

cells.english: Salome witnessed: That the Virgin gave birth: She believed and confirmed: The mystery of mysteries.
cells.arabic: سالومي شهدت: إن العذراء ولدت: آمنت وأعتقدت: بالسر المكنون

cells.english: Your love embraced me: O pride of nations: Moses has seen you: Surprise and marvel: And the lamps are bright: With golden crosses. Moses' dome, O Mary: O Aaron's censer
cells.arabic: سباني حُبك: يافخرَ الرتب: موسى رآكِ: عجب من عجب: والقناديل فضة بتضوي: والصلبان ذهب : ياقبة موسى يامريم: ياشورية هرون

cells.english: Solomon, your father: Praised in hymns and songs: And Jacob saw you: An upright ladder
cells.arabic: سليمان أباك: صار ينشد بفنون: ويعقوب رآك: سلم مرتفعون

cells.english: The chiefs had proclaimed: O fruitful vine: You are a Virgin and a bride: As they prophesied
cells.arabic: شهد عنك الرؤساء: ياكرمة مغروسة: يابكرة وعروسة: كما عنك تنبأون

cells.english: Zephaniah proclaimed: That Jesus will appear: As rain and dew: While her Virginity is sealed
cells.arabic: صوفونيوس خبر: بأن يسوع يظهر: شبه ندي ومطر: والختم حصن مصون

cells.english: Eve caused Adam to stray: In tears, he cried: Naked, he was exiled: Without you they would not return
cells.arabic: ضللت حواء آدم: وصار يبكى نادم: خرج عريان عادم: لولاك ما رجعون

cells.english: Your rank is up high: And great is your glory: The Lord honored you: O Aaron's censer
cells.arabic: عال هو قدرك: وعظيم هو مجدك: والله شرف ذكرك: يا شورية هرون

cells.english: Many praised you: You are the cause of all joy: You comfort everyone: Who is sorrowful and humble
cells.arabic: غلب فيك المداح: يا بدء الأفراح: بمديحك يرتاح: كل ذليل محزون

cells.english: Your love embraced me: O pride of nations: Moses has seen you: Surprise and marvel: And the lamps are bright: With golden crosses. Moses' dome, O Mary: O Aaron's censer
cells.arabic: سباني حُبك: يافخرَ الرتب: موسى رآكِ: عجب من عجب: والقناديل فضة بتضوي: والصلبان ذهب : ياقبة موسى يامريم: ياشورية هرون

cells.english: My heart rejoices in you: O Virgin Mary: Ask your Son Jesus: To protect me by His Might
cells.arabic: فيك رضا قلبى: يامريم طلبى: يسوع إبنك حسبى: بقوته أكون

cells.english: Existent before the ages: Suffered and was crucified: He rose from His sleep: And the Disciples preached
cells.arabic: قديم أذلي دائم: صلب عنا وتألم: استيقظ كالنائم: والتلاميذ يكرزون

cells.english: The righteous Apostles: And the four Evangelists: Preached in all nations: The tidings and rejoice
cells.arabic: كرزوا في الأقطار: الرسل الأبرار: ونادوا باستبشار: الأباء الإنجيليون

cells.english: Glory is due to you: O daughter of Joachim: You bore a great mystery: And gave birth to the Most High
cells.arabic: لك كل التعظيم: ياإبنة يواقيم: حملت سر عظيم: ووضعت المكنون

cells.english: Moses and Daniel: Said many parables: And you fit all that: Mysteriously and more
cells.arabic: موسي ودانيال: ضربوا عنك أمثال: وقبلت ماقال: بسر خفي مكنون

cells.english: You caused the world to shine: O the pride of faith: All the creatures were free: Because of you Mary
cells.arabic: نورت الأكوان: يافخر الإيمان: لولاك ماكان: كل الخلائق يعتقون

cells.english: Gifts were offered in faith: To the King of kings: By the great Magi: Myrrh, gold and frankincense
cells.arabic: هدايا بإيمان: أتوا بهم الأعيان: مرا وذهباً ولبان: بها المجوس حاملون

cells.english: They worshipped the born King: The Lord of lords: And Herod was terrified: And his soldiers marveled
cells.arabic: وسجدوا للمولود: الرب المعبود: وهيرودس صار مرعوب: وجنده محتارون

cells.english: Do not forsake at that time: A poor and humble sinner: Your plead on Judgment Day: And for all the Christians
cells.arabic: لا تنسى في ذلك الحين: عبداً خاطئ مسكين: شفاعتك يوم الدين: لشعب ابنك أجمعين

cells.english: We ask of Him forgiveness: Faith and repentance: To be in calmness: We the believers
cells.arabic: ونسأل من جوده الغفران: وتوبة مع إيمان: لنصير في اطمئنان: نحن المؤمنون

cells.english: Your love embraced me: O pride of nations: Moses has seen you: Surprise and marvel: And the lamps are bright: With golden crosses. Moses' dome, O Mary: O Aaron's censer
cells.arabic: سباني حُبك: يافخرَ الرتب: موسى رآكِ: عجب من عجب: والقناديل فضة بتضوي: والصلبان ذهب : ياقبة موسى يامريم: ياشورية هرون

english_title: In the Midst of the Raging Sea

cells.english: In the midst of the raging sea,
There I was sailing.
The waves were pounding me,
Making me afraid.
And it seems That Christ has left me, (2)
But I no longer see him because of my weak faith (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: wa la 3odt ashoofoo min da3f emanee (2)
cells.arabic: ولا عدت أشوفه من ضعف إيماني (2)

cells.english: Jesus when he saw me,
Came to me quickly.
In my despair and darkness,
He opened my eyes.
When I saw him, I cried have mercy (2)
He came to me quickly and had mercy on me (2)
The sounds of the angry waves,
Agonized my ears.
Darkness of the creeping night,
Has threatened my peace.
And the tears, have not left my eyes (2)
And the sleepless nights, have overwhelmed me (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: we ilne3as ilhadey kad farek agfanee (2)

cells.english: Jesus when he saw me,
Came to me quickly.
In my despair and darkness,
He opened my eyes.
When I saw him, I cried have mercy (2)
He came to me quickly and had mercy on me (2)
I took the oar and started rowing,
But my hopes have failed
My weakness and my ignorance,
Brought more grief to me.
And my Lord, at the shore sees me (2)
When will you come to me, and restore my hope? (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: imta tygee ya rabee we terodelee amalee (2)
cells.arabic: أمتى تيجى يا ربى وترد أماني (2)

cells.english: Jesus when he saw me,
Came to me quickly.
In my despair and darkness,
He opened my eyes.
When I saw him, I cried have mercy (2)
He came to me quickly and had mercy on me (2)
I was in despair and drowning,
And my hope is torn.
I came to my beloved Jesus,
Offering him my tears.
When he saw me, He had compassion on me (2)
He stretched out his sweet hand, and dried my tears (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: mad eydoo ilhelwa we masah lee 3eneya (2)
cells.arabic: مد ايده الحلوة ومسح لى عيني (2)

cells.english: Jesus when he saw me,
Came to me quickly.
In my despair and darkness,
He opened my eyes.
When I saw him, I cried have mercy (2)
He came to me quickly and had mercy on me (2)

english_title: In the Shade of Your Protection
audio_file: In the Shade of Your Protection

cells.english: In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
O the pride of the human race,
the best of people are you.
O you river of gifts
that flows into the world.
In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
O you gate of heaven,
Mother of our Redeemer,
O you are our hope,
and the sweetest name we call.
In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
Intercede for your people.
Pray at all times.
We are asking your Son,
with the spirit of children.
In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
Have mercy on your servants
They remain faithful
They seek evermore
From you at all times
In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
O God, My God, Why have you gone from me
Far from my prayers, far from my cry
To you I call, but you never answer me
You send no comfort and I don't know why
Into Your Hands, We commend our spirits O Lord
Into Your Hands, We commend our hearts
For we must die to ourselves in loving You
Into Your Hands we commend our love
Our fathers trusted and You delivered them
To You they cry, and they escaped
In You they trusted when darkness came their way
And in Your goodness You made them free
Into Your Hands, We commend our spirits O Lord
Into Your Hands, We commend our hearts
For we must die to ourselves in loving You
Into Your Hands we commend our love
You've been my guide since I was very young
You showed the way when I needed someone's hand
But now I'm lonely, nobody is at my side
Stay near my Lord, and be my friend.
Into Your Hands, We commend our spirits O Lord
Into Your Hands, We commend our hearts
For we must die to ourselves in loving You
Into Your Hands we commend our love
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
Your house is prayer, praise, and candles,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Baytak salat wa tahleel wa shumu'

cells.english: Your house is Love, Light, and Peace,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Baytak mahabbah wa noor wa salam

cells.english: Just as I love your house O Lord
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Zay ma habeet baytak ya Yasouh
cells.arabic: زي ما حبيت بيتك يا يسوع

cells.english: I Love You unto the end of day
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
Your house is full of blessings,
Protected against all demons.
We celebrate there the liturgies,
They’re prayed for the saints.
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
In Your house we read the Bible
And learn there the nicest songs.
And hear there the blessed hymns,
And praise You all our lives.
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
Blessed are they who are blameless,
O Lord in Your house living.
Confirm me in Your luminous ways,
Forever and ever, Amen.
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
Mary, beautiful name, heals all pain
cells.arabic: مريم اسم جميل يشفى كل عليل

cells.english: Mother of God, treasure of mercy, source of praise
cells.enPhonicsSongs: umm illaah wa kanz ir-ra7ma wa asl it-tahlil
cells.arabic: أم الله وكنز الرحمه واصل التهليل

cells.english: When I heard you appeared
In church of Zeitoun
My heart longed to see
You, O tender Mother
All my life, from my youth
For your love I long
I think of you, O Mary
And sing the hidden mystery
Mary, beautiful name, heals all pain
cells.arabic: مريم اسم جميل يشفى كل عليل

cells.english: Mother of God, treasure of mercy, source of praise
cells.enPhonicsSongs: umm illaah wa kanz ir-ra7ma wa asl it-tahlil
cells.arabic: أم الله وكنز الرحمه واصل التهليل

cells.english: As I grow, I love you more
O fortress of salvation
You’re the flower, the throne
For the Lord our God
All my wounds fade, O Mary
By your prayers’ grace
All blessings my eyes will see
By your intercession’s grace
Mary, beautiful name, heals all pain
cells.arabic: مريم اسم جميل يشفى كل عليل

cells.english: Mother of God, treasure of mercy, source of praise
cells.enPhonicsSongs: umm illaah wa kanz ir-ra7ma wa asl it-tahlil
cells.arabic: أم الله وكنز الرحمه واصل التهليل

cells.english: Without you, O Mary
Who can guide the lost
Without you, O Mary
Who intercedes for tears
Without you, O Mary
In the faith of believers
Without you, O Mary
Pride of Christians
Mary, beautiful name, heals all pain
cells.arabic: مريم اسم جميل يشفى كل عليل

cells.english: Mother of God, treasure of mercy, source of praise
cells.enPhonicsSongs: umm illaah wa kanz ir-ra7ma wa asl it-tahlil
cells.arabic: أم الله وكنز الرحمه واصل التهليل

cells.english: Who is kinder than you
To whom we turn
Whose intercession is strong
On whom we rely
Who knows your essence, O Mary
And can describe it
Are you heaven or sun
What shall we call you
Mary, beautiful name, heals all pain
cells.arabic: مريم اسم جميل يشفى كل عليل

cells.english: Mother of God, treasure of mercy, source of praise
cells.enPhonicsSongs: umm illaah wa kanz ir-ra7ma wa asl it-tahlil
cells.arabic: أم الله وكنز الرحمه واصل التهليل

cells.english: Whoever denies your grace
Sorrow will find them
Show them, O Mary, your glory
Open their eyes
At once they’ll know your glory
And your virtues upon them
They’ll weep, saying, O my folly
I denied her grace
Mary, beautiful name, heals all pain
cells.arabic: مريم اسم جميل يشفى كل عليل

cells.english: Mother of God, treasure of mercy, source of praise
cells.enPhonicsSongs: umm illaah wa kanz ir-ra7ma wa asl it-tahlil
cells.arabic: أم الله وكنز الرحمه واصل التهليل

cells.english: Intercede for us, O Mary
We are Christ’ people
Come, dwell among us
And wipe away our tears
Bless the Pope (...)
Keep his name exalted
Guide his every step
And every endeavor
Mary, beautiful name, heals all pain
cells.arabic: مريم اسم جميل يشفى كل عليل

cells.english: Mother of God, treasure of mercy, source of praise
cells.enPhonicsSongs: umm illaah wa kanz ir-ra7ma wa asl it-tahlil
cells.arabic: أم الله وكنز الرحمه واصل التهليل

english_title: My Church, My Church, My Church

cells.english: My church, my church, my church
She's my home, she's my mother
She's the source of all my joy
When I was a little child
Forty days to be exact
My parents took me with great joy
to the church to be baptized
abouna took me by the hands
and dipped me in a deeper water
that was my baptism
it was a second birth for me
My church, my church, my church
She's my home, she's my mother
She's the source of all my joy
She raised me since my childhood
in the sunday school
joyful with me and i with her
because my faith grew in her
i build my values on her teachings
and obey all her guidance
my Lord please take care of her
and bless her forever
My church, my church, my church
She's my home, she's my mother
She's the source of all my joy
whats best in her is on the altar
the heavenly are there in great glory
the hosts of the angels are singing
praising our dear savior
cells.enPhonicsSongs: bahga we farha we rahba we noor

cells.english: we eat His body with great joy
cells.enPhonicsSongs: We ehna nakol gasadoo we nefrah

cells.english: And His blood keeps harm away
in communion we win the kingdom
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Da lee beyet nawel ha yerbah

cells.english: and life eternal
My church, my church, my church
She's my home, she's my mother
She's the source of all my joy
My Coptic Church. The church of the Lord
Ancient and Strong, I wish her long life
In the early years, After the birth of Christ
St. Mark came bearing, The light of the true faith
cells.arabic: مر قس أتى بنور إيمانه الصحيح

cells.english: He dwelt in the land, proclaiming salvation
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Wa 7alla fel belade, yonadee bel khalas
cells.arabic: و جال في البلاد ينادى بالخلاص

cells.english: In the name of our Redeemer, Christ who removed our sins
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Besmel masee7 el fadi, man yarfa3ol qasas
cells.arabic: بإسم المسيح الفادى من يرفع القصاص

cells.english: The Copts then believed, in the Lord Jesus
And Joy filled all the cities of Egypt
cells.arabic: و حل الاغتباط في كافة الربوع

cells.english: In a very very short time, He abolished all idols
cells.arabic: في أمد قريب قد حطموا الأوثان

cells.english: The cross was exalted, the sign of the faith
cells.arabic: و ارتفع الصليب و راية الإيمان

cells.english: Satan quickly rose, to war the Son of God
cells.arabic: إبليس حالا قام يحارب ابن الله

cells.english: He stirred the rulers, emperors and armies
cells.arabic: فهيج الحكام و الجند و الولاة

cells.english: He then declared war, on the sons of the faith
Deny your Christ, or be thrown in the fire
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Hayya enkerol masee7a, aw tolqo fel neeran
cells.arabic: هيا انكروا المسيح أو تلقوا في النيران

cells.english: Our honored fathers, elders and youngsters
Were not moved by pain, distress nor dishonor
cells.arabic: لم يثنهم آلام و شدة و عار

cells.english: But said courageously, forward no turning back
cells.arabic: بل قالوا بانتصار للخلف لا رجوع

cells.english: We don't fear fire, Our Lord is Jesus Christ
cells.enPhonicsSongs: La nagza3o men naren, elahona yasoo3
cells.arabic: لا نجزع من نار إلهنا يسوع

cells.english: They were beaten and imprisoned, they lived in oppression
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Kam dorebo kam sogeno, kam 3asho fekte’ab
cells.arabic: كم ضربوا كم سجنوا كم عاشوا في اكتئاب

cells.english: They were burned and killed, and tasted every pain
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Kam qotelo kam 7oreqo, kam zaqo men 3azab
cells.arabic: كم قتلوا كم حرقوا كم ذاقوا من عذاب

cells.english: By the power of their faith, they overcame their pains
And remained believing in, the King of Peace
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Wa damo thabeteen, fee malekel salam
cells.arabic: و داموا ثابتين في ملك السلام

cells.english: With blood and suffering, they bought the faith
cells.arabic: بالدم و العناء قد اشتروا الإيمان

cells.english: And preserved it for us, in the name of Our Savior
cells.arabic: و احتفظوا لنا بإسم الفادي الرحمن

cells.english: Let us all rise, from our laziness
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Haya bena naqoom, men shedatel kasal
cells.arabic: هيا بنا نقوم من شدة الكسل

cells.english: With diligence seeking, the heavenly rewards
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Wa lel3ola naroom, wa nas3a bel3agal
cells.arabic: و للعلى نروم و نسعى بالعجل

cells.english: The Church of the Fathers, you are our pride
To her success, let us all join together
My Coptic Church, her faith is orthodox
Forever strong, Egypt is Christ's
cells.arabic: إلى الأبد قوية يا مصر للمسيح

cells.english: My Coptic Church so great
You spread the Christian faith
In the Ethiopian country
In Nubia and Sudan
In the Western nations
In the African continent
And in European cities
You witnessed for the faith
O Coptic Church of God
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya kenisa ya qaweya ya madinat el-salat
cells.arabic: يا كنيسة يا قوية يا مدينة الصلاة

cells.english: Persecuted but survived
In the council of Nicea
Heresies, you stood against
Your deacon Athanasius
He is the hero of faith
St. Clement and St. Oregon
St. Cyril and St. Dioscorus
St.Paul and St. Anthony
Your men that were so brave
O Coptic Church of God
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya kenisa ya qaweya ya madinat el-salat
cells.arabic: يا كنيسة يا قوية يا مدينة الصلاة

cells.english: Persecuted but survived
A church and a monastery
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Kenisa wa dayr wa mazbah wa heber
cells.arabic: كنيسة و دير و مذبح و حبر

cells.english: An altar and a sanctuary
Your sacraments are seven
They lead us up to heaven
By powers so divine
By prayers and by strife
O Coptic Church of God
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya kenisa ya qaweya ya madinat el-salat
cells.arabic: يا كنيسة يا قوية يا مدينة الصلاة

cells.english: Persecuted but survived
Jesus Christ visited you
With His mother St. Mary
St. Mark’s blood so pure
Watered you with the faith
O Mother of the Martyrs
St. George and St. Demiana
And the blessed St. Peter
The seal of the martyrs
O Coptic Church of God
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya kenisa ya qaweya ya madinat el-salat
cells.arabic: يا كنيسة يا قوية يا مدينة الصلاة

cells.english: Persecuted but survived
My Cross, Oh my Cross
You're made out of wood
But valued in my eyes
Precious more than Gold (2)
My Cross, Oh my Cross
I'm always proud of you
In front of all the nations
I exalt and praise you.
My Cross, Oh my Cross
You're made out of wood
But valued in my eyes
Precious more than Gold (2)
My Cross, Oh my Cross
With me in every place
In all my Tribulations
In light and in darkness
My Cross, Oh my Cross
You're made out of wood
But valued in my eyes
Precious more than Gold (2)
My Cross, Oh my Cross
You give me victory
You are the throne of God
The Son of the Almighty
My Cross, Oh my Cross
You're made out of wood
But valued in my eyes
Precious more than Gold (2)
My fathers the monks of the desert
I wish to live a life like yours (2)
Life of prayer, vigils and tears (2)
You offer to our Savior
My fathers, my fathers
Father of the monks Abba Antonius
His disciple Abba Macarius (2)
Left everything of worth and value
cells.enPhonicsSongs: tarakoo kull ghaali ghaali wa thamiin

cells.english: To serve their faithful Savior (2)
My fathers, my fathers
My fathers the monks of the desert
I wish to live a life like yours (2)
Life of prayer, vigils and tears (2)
You offer to our Savior
My fathers, my fathers
When they were attacked by the Barbarians
No one was afraid or denied his faith (2)
They said our Lord is Jesus Christ
For whom our lives we´d sacrifice (2)
My fathers, my fathers
My fathers the monks of the desert
I wish to live a life like yours (2)
Life of prayer, vigils and tears (2)
You offer to our Savior
My fathers, my fathers
I am a youth struggling in the way
God's word I must learn to obey (2)
Please pray for me, St. Anthony (2)
That Christ my abide in me fully
My fathers, my fathers
My fathers the monks of the desert
I wish to live a life like yours (2)
Life of prayer, vigils and tears (2)
You offer to our Savior
My fathers, my fathers
My guardian angel is by me
Shadowing me like a tree.
We sing our psalms together,
We share praises and prayer.
"Your voice is sweet."
"No, yours is better."
He is there to share with me.
When I feel afraid of a thing
He takes me under his wing.
Alerts me when I go wrong,
And helps me to stay as strong.
This is my angel, my angel,
This is my guardian angel.
My guardian angel is by me
Shadowing me like a tree.
We sing our psalms together,
We share praises and prayer.
"Your voice is sweet."
"No, yours is better."
He is there to share with me.
When at home, he's there
Blessing every little corner;
He is happy when we care,
Love each other and spare.
This is my angel, my angel,
This is my guardian angel.
My guardian angel is by me
Shadowing me like a tree.
We sing our psalms together,
We share praises and prayer.
"Your voice is sweet."
"No, yours is better."
He is there to share with me.
He tells me to be always joyful,
Teaches me to be thankful,
Helps me to remain faithful,
Oh, he is so wonderful.
This is my angel, my angel,
This is my guardian angel.
My guardian angel is by me
Shadowing me like a tree.
We sing our psalms together,
We share praises and prayer.
"Your voice is sweet."
"No, yours is better."
He is there to share with me.
My Lord, precious Jesus,
No one is more beloved,
With Him I am no stranger,
And the cross is no burden.
How beautiful is life with Him,
Jesus, Lord of heaven!
He blesses life,
Living with Him is pleasant!
In His protection I live. (2)
With vigor my soul tread,
Upon all the lusts,
My beloved is lovely,
Filled with splendor.
How beautiful is life with Him,
Jesus, Lord of heaven!
He blesses life,
Living with Him is pleasant!
In His protection I live. (2)
My pains in the wilderness,
Their number matters not,
In eternal meadows,
The Omnipotent carries me.
How beautiful is life with Him,
Jesus, Lord of heaven!
He blesses life,
Living with Him is pleasant!
In His protection I live. (2)
Night of the last supper (2)
Jesus took bread and broke,
and said "This is My Body." (2)
Our Master, our Savior, gave us the vine of love.
He is the Bread of life,
coming from heaven above. (3)
Night when my Lord suffered (2)
He took wine and gave thanks,
and said "This is My Blood". (2)
This is the Groom's supper, is given to His bride.
Promising eternal life,
up in the Lord's kingdom. (2)
This is the food of souls, is offered to us all.
And the blood is given,
to help me lest I fall. (2)
Jesus You are my hope, forgive my sins O Lord.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: yaa sayyidi il-ma7boob yaa saatir il-3uyoob
cells.arabic: يا سيدي المحبوب يا ساتر العيوب

cells.english: Wash me and clean my soul,
put on me a new robe. (2)
My heart I give to You, Your will I want to do.
Your love to me I knew,
when You paid all my dues. (2)
Jesus fill all my heart, the devil has no part.
And through this sacrament,
He gave me a new start. (2)
Jesus to you I pray, to lead me in Your way.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: yaa ghaafir iz-zunoob yaa maasi7 il-3uyoob
cells.arabic: يا غافر الذنوب يا ماسح العيوب

cells.english: Bless me and help me obey,
all what the Bible says. (2)
Christ suffered for my sake, His mercy is so great.
My sins Jesus forgave,
and a new life He gave. (2)
My heart is filled with joy, and my spirit rejoices.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: yaa sayyidi il-majroo7 lamaa sallamt ir-roo7
cells.arabic: يا سيدى المجروح لما سلمت الروح

cells.english: With God I have union,
when I take Communion. (2)
No eye has seen another God like you
Who opens the jails and shatters the chains (2)
who parts the sea and behold there's a path
No mountian or barriers get in his way
No eye has seen another God like you (2)
Who else but you could appear in the flames
Or rescue a soul from the lion's den (2)
cells.arabic: أو ينجى النفس من جب الأسود (2)

cells.english: Who lights the way when the darkness comes
cells.arabic: من ينير القفر إن حل الظلام

cells.english: with a blaze of love in a pillar of fire.
No eye has seen another God like you (2)
Who else but you went to calvary
who else paid my depts, carried my iniquity (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: ki ta3idd li makaanan fi il-khulood (2)
cells.arabic: كى تعد لى مكانًا فى الخلود (2)

cells.english: And you promised me you're coming very soon
To take me to heaven for eternity.
No eye has seen another God like you (2)

cells.arabic: حينما نحفظ و نصل و نقول

cells.english: No eye has seen another God like you (2)

cells.arabic: لم تكن عيناى يا ربى ترى

cells.english: No eye has seen another God like you (2)
O Beloved, O Beloved, nailed unto the cross for me
cells.arabic: وا حبيبي وآ حبيبي، أي حال أنت فيه

cells.english: O what sin hast Thou committed, Thou who callest all to be.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: min shajaak min saqaak, ka's khall tirtadiih
cells.arabic: من شجاك من سقاك، كأس خل ترتضيه

cells.english: O Beloved, wish that I could spend the rest of life with Thee
cells.arabic: يا حبيبي أي ذنب، قد صنعت أو كريه

cells.english: Worshipping Thine Holy Passion, crucifying the flesh for Thee.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: 'anta majhood jarii7, laysa fiik min shifaa'
cells.arabic: أنت مجهود جريح، ليس فيك من شفاء

cells.english: Daughter of Zion behold Me, stricken and smitten for Thee
cells.enPhonicsSongs: bint sahyoon unzurini, ghaariqan fi zii illujag
cells.arabic: بنت صهيون انظريني، غارقا في ذي اللجج

cells.english: Friend and kin, me have forsaken, there is none to comfort Me.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: qad tarakt wa khuzilt, wal-balaa kabdi walaj
cells.arabic: قد تركت و خذلت، و البلا كبدي ولج

cells.english: All alone I’ll tread the winepress, all alone I’ll drink the cup
cells.enPhonicsSongs: laa sadiiq laa wala min, insibaa'i man kharaj
cells.arabic: لا صديق لا و لا مِن، انسبائي مَن خرج

cells.english: Shedding My blood for thee to ransom, and My flesh for thee to sup.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: kay yazood il-3aar 3anni, wa yusalli il-mubtala
cells.arabic: كي يذود العار عنى، ويُسَلي المُبتلى

cells.english: I was bound and I was smitten, and they did spit in my face
cells.enPhonicsSongs: qad rubitt wa duribt, mithl 'adnaa il-marzuuliin
cells.arabic: قد ربطت و ضربت، مثل أدنى المرذولين

cells.english: I was stripped and I was scourged, I was condemned in your place.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: bisiyaat qad julidt, mithl sharr il-mujrimiin
cells.arabic: بسياط قد جلدت، مثل شر المجرمين

cells.english: Your sins became My crown of thorns, O that you would understand
cells.enPhonicsSongs: kull haazaa min jaraakum, kay takoonoo fara7iin
cells.arabic: كل هذا من جراكم، كي تكونوا فرحين

cells.english: Every time you sin anew, it’s one more nail in My hand.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: fa-unzurooni hal ra'aytum, mithl saqmi fi il-waraa
cells.arabic: فانظروني هل رأيتم، مثل سقمي في الورى

cells.english: Like a lamb brought to the slaughter, like a dumb sheep to be sheered
cells.enPhonicsSongs: ru7t fi il-bustaan laylan, wal-7ashaa minni idtarab
cells.arabic: رحت في البستان ليلا، والحشى مني أضطرب

cells.english: King, Creator, Lord, and Master, by His creatures mocked and jeered.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: khift sallayt dajirt, wat-tala minni insakab
cells.arabic: خفت صليت ضجرت، و الطلا منى انسكب

cells.english: Despised, rejected with grief acquainted, and of men was not esteemed
cells.enPhonicsSongs: qult rabbi in ra'ayt, fadfi3an 3anni il-3atab
cells.arabic: قلت ربى إن رأيت، فادفعن عنى العطب

cells.english: Bruised and wounded, sore afflicted, yet with His stripes we were healed.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: 7uzn nafsi laa yumaathil, bighariiq fi it-tamaa
cells.arabic: حزن نفسي لا يماثل، بغريق في الطمى

cells.english: Lord, create in us a fountain that with tears will ever flow
And a heart contrite and broken, and a Spirit within renew.
cells.arabic: كل عوني فر عنى، مثل إنسان غريب

cells.english: O that we could shed the tears over Thy feet pierced and bruised
cells.enPhonicsSongs: fanaadayt wa talabt, mubdi3 il-kawn ir-raqiib
cells.arabic: فناديت و طلبت، مبدع الكون الرقيب

cells.english: O that we always remember, for our sins Thou were abused.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: 'aqqaba iz-zulm inkhizaali, wa idtiraab wa bukaa'
cells.arabic: أعقب الظلم إنخذالى، و اضطراب و بكاء

cells.enPhonicsSongs: yaa yasoo3 ujri fiinaa, sayl dam3 munhamir
cells.arabic: يا يسوع اجر فينا، سيل دمع منهمر
يلتظ القلب بنار، حزن قلب منكسر

cells.enPhonicsSongs: laytinaa tool illayaali, nadaman nahmi id-dimaa'
cells.arabic: ليتنا طول الليالي، ندما نهمى الدماء

english_title: O Coptic Bride of My Savior

cells.english: O coptic bride of my savior,
And the light of my homeland Egypt
With a flaming love in my heart,
I adore you Orthodox faith.
Mother of the martyrs is beautiful,
Mother of the honorable is noble
She crossed the sea of all sufferings,
She preserved with her blood the faith.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: hafezat be demaha el hak kaweem

cells.english: O Mother your love made me alive,
Your pain is the seed of my faith
You went through the worst of times,
And you got out of them victorious.
Mother of the martyrs is beautiful,
Mother of the honorable is noble
She crossed the sea of all sufferings,
She preserved with her blood the faith.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: hafezat be demaha el hak kaweem

cells.english: Your enemies struck you and hurt you,
They've put you in jails and have killed you
As food for beasts they made you,
And to every pain exposed you.
Mother of the martyrs is beautiful,
Mother of the honorable is noble
She crossed the sea of all sufferings,
She preserved with her blood the faith.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: hafezat be demaha el hak kaweem

cells.english: O Mother how faithful you were,
And love of your bridegroom filled you
His sacraments He gave you,
And by his power you are guarded.
Mother of the martyrs is beautiful,
Mother of the honorable is noble
She crossed the sea of all sufferings,
She preserved with her blood the faith.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: hafezat be demaha el hak kaweem

cells.english: How beautiful is my wounded Mother,
For the sake of the savior and His servants
Blessed is he who will love you,
Who will preserve your faith.
Mother of the martyrs is beautiful,
Mother of the honorable is noble
She crossed the sea of all sufferings,
She preserved with her blood the faith.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: hafezat be demaha el hak kaweem

cells.english: I hope my heart starts to love you,
So that i would live your faith
And chase away your enemies,
Renewing your old days.
Mother of the martyrs is beautiful,
Mother of the honorable is noble
She crossed the sea of all sufferings,
She preserved with her blood the faith.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: hafezat be demaha el hak kaweem

cells.english: O Mother here i come,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: ya omy atharek fe el wady

cells.english: Your love boiling in my veins
I promise with all my heart,
I shall serve my Father's church.
Mother of the martyrs is beautiful,
Mother of the honorable is noble
She crossed the sea of all sufferings,
She preserved with her blood the faith.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: hafezat be demaha el hak kaweem

cells.english: O Mary: Lady of virgins: you attained greatness: from the True Light: You are exalted: by the Lord Himself: you bore the Creator: O what a great marvel!
cells.enPhonics1: Ya meem reh yeh meem: ya set el-abkar: qad nelty taazeem: men noor el-anwar: wa wohebty taazeem: men endoo qad sar: wa Hamalty al-khaleq: man za la yaHtar.
cells.arabic: يا م ر ى م : ياست الأبكار : قد نلت تعظيم : من نور الأنوار : ووهبت تعظيم : من عنده قد صار : وحملت الخالق : من ذا لا يحتار

cells.english: Wondrous among nations: wisdom to rulers: a hidden gem: and the gospel spoke of you:: They give you blessings: in all generations: O daughter of Joachim: exalted above the Cherubim.
cells.enPhonics1: Qad serty ogooba: lel roasa amthal: dorrah maHgooba: wa fi el-engeel qad qal: yotonek el-tooba: fi kol al-gial: ya ebnat youaqeem: qad foqty el-Cheroubim.
cells.arabic: قد صرت اعجوبة : للرؤساء امثال : درة محجوبة : وفي الانجيل قد قال : يعطونك الطوبا : في كل الاجيال : يا ابنة يواقيم : قد فقتي الشاروبيم

cells.english: You attained what no one could: O Mother of the Mercy: and you became: filled with grace: To the Divine you became: a veil for the Word: and greatly marveled: were you among the scholars.
cells.enPhonics1: Man nal ma nelty: ya om el-raHma: wa anty qaad serty: mamlooa nema: wa lel lahot serty: Hegaban lel-kalema: wa aHtar fiki: arbab al-tafheem.
cells.arabic: من نال ما نلتى : يا ام الرحمة : وانتي قد صرتي : مملؤة نعمه : وللاهوت صرتي : حجابا للكلمة : واحتار فيك: ارباب التفهيم

cells.english: O tabernacle of the covenant: O censer of Aaron: O spirit of glory: O daughter of Zion: O the light of eyes: with you we rejoice: and abide in grace: O full of grace.
cells.enPhonics1: Ya taboot el-ahde: ya magmaret Haroun: ya roH el-magd: ya ebnat Sehioun: ya noor el-oyoon: beky nasadoo: wa naHza bel-naeem: ya mamloua nema.
cells.arabic: يا تابوت العهد : يا مجمرة هارون : يا روح المجد : يا ابنة صهيون : يا نور العيون : بك نسعد : ونحظي بالنعيم : يا مملؤة نعمه

cells.english: O full of grace: the fortifying fortress: the jewel of mercy: the aid of the poor: Your son has purged death: O the intercessor of saints: intercede for us: O Mother of Mercy.
cells.enPhonics1: Ya mamloua nema: anty el-Hesn el-Haseen: anty kanz el-raHma: ya awn al-masakeen: be-ebnek zalet el naqma: ya shafee3et el-qedisin: Wa shafi3etna fil-zaHma: ya om el-raHim.
cells.arabic: يا مملؤة نعمه : انت الحصن الحصين: انت كنز الرحمة: يا عون المساكين : بإبنك زالت النقمة : يا شفيعة القديسين : وشفيعتنا في الزحمة : يا ام الرحيم

cells.english: Hail to you: O Lady of virgins: O daughter of Joachim: the chosen throne: Righteous is your Son: He purged our shame: the glorious God: the Creator of ages.
cells.enPhonics1: Noqadem laky a-tazeem: ya set el-abkar: ya ebnat Yowaqim: ya korseyan mokhtar: wel-mawlood menky karim: azal anna al-ar: al-elah el-azeem: khalek el ad-har.
cells.arabic: نقدم لك التعظيم : ياست الأبكار : يا ابنة يواقيم : يا كرسيا مختار : والمولود منك كريم : ازال عنا العار : الاله العظيم : خالق الادهار

cells.english: The adornment of virgins: the holy Mother: the purity of the pure: O light of lights: O jewel of grace: O Mother of Mercy: truly you are the vine: filled and bearing fruit.
cells.enPhonics1: Ya zen el-abkar: ya qods el-aHbar: ya tohr el-at-har: ya noor el-anwar: ya kanz al-nema: ya om el-raHma: anty heya al-karma: al-mamloua athmar.
cells.arabic: يا زين الأبكار : يا قدس الأحبار : يا طهر الأطهار : يا نور الأنوار : يا كنز النعمة : يا ام الرحمة: أنت هي الكرمة : المملؤة أثمار

cells.english: O daughter of Joachim: you attained greatness: you are Jerusalem: glorious and honored: You are Zion: O precious jewel;: you released the captive: from the Deceiver’s hand.
cells.enPhonics1: Ya ebnat Yowaqim: qad nelty al-tazeem: anty heya Orshaleem: zat al-magd wal fakhar: anty heya Sehioun: ya gawharan maknoon: fakakty el-masgoon: men yad el-makar.
cells.arabic: يا ابنة يواقيم : قد نلت التعظيم : انت هي اورشليم : ذات المجد والفخار : انت هي صهيون : يا جوهرا مكنون : فككت المسجون : من يد المكار

cells.english: Your son saved Adam: the repentant sinner: humanity He set free: from all adversaries: The Lord from your childhood: witnessed your purity: and therefore has blessed you: before all nations.
cells.enPhonics1: Ebnek khalas Adam: el-khaty el-nadem: we ataq el-alam: men kol el-adrar: rabek men soghrek: lamma raa tohrek: qad tayab zekrek: fi kol el-aqtar.
cells.arabic: ابنك خلص ادم : الخاطئ النادم : وعتق العالم : من كل الاضرار : ربك من صغرك : لما رأي طهرك : قد طيب ذكرك: في كل الاقطار

cells.english: He sent you Gabriel: the Messenger of His words: and greeted you saying: The Lord has chosen you: His Holy Spirit: filled and dwelt within you: blessed are you O Virgin: throughout all ages."
cells.enPhonics1: Arsal laky Ghabrial: bemoHkam el aqwal: wa basharek ez qal: Allaho laky ekhtar: roH qodsoh malaky: wa sakan fi aHshaky: ya adra toobaky: fi kol el agial.
cells.arabic: ارسل لك غبريال : بمحكم الاقوال : وبشرك اذ قال : الله لك اختار : روح قدسه ملاك : وسكن في احشاك يا: عذرا طوباك : في كل الاجيال

cells.english: The Unseen and Holy: was born from you: and was called Jesus: for all eyes to see: Moses saw the bush: blazing with fire: its branches flaming: yet the bush was not consumed.
cells.enPhonics1: An gher el-maHsoos: al-rab el qodoos: menky ata wa doaya Isoos: wa nazarat-ho el-absar: Mousa raa al-awsag: wal-nar fihi tata-gag: wa aghsanoh tatawahag: ma darat-ho al-nar.
cells.arabic: ان غير المحسوس : الرب القدوس : منك اتي ودعي ايسوس : ونظرته الابصار : موسي رأي العوسج : والنار فيه تتأجج : وأغصانه تتوهج : ما ضرته النار

cells.english: The blazing bush: which Moses had seen: was indeed Mary: the adornment of virgins: The fire is Jesus: the Holy Lord: who gave us the Law: engraved in stone.
cells.enPhonics1: Ena ma raat-ho al-aynan: moltaheban bel-niran: fi el-awsag wal-aghsan: heya Mariam zenat el-abkar: wel-nar heya Isoos: al-rab el-qodoos: motina el-namoos: maktooban fil-aHgar.
cells.arabic: ان ما رأته العينان : ملتهبا بالنيران : في العوسج والأغصان : هي مريم زينة الأبكار : والنار هي إيسوس : الرب القدوس : معطينا الناموس : مكتوبا في الاحجار

cells.english: Isaiah prophesied: about the birth: of Emmanuel: the Almighty King: Ezekiel saw a door: through which the Lord entered: He sealed the door and claimed it: highly exalted.
cells.enPhonics1: Fi Asheya qad qeel: an haza el-taweel: taled emanoueel: al-malek el-gabar: wa Hazqeyal raa bab: dakhal feeh rab el-arbab: wa khetm el-bab mohab: alya el-meqdar.
cells.arabic: في اشعيا قد قيل : عن هذا التأويل : تلد عمانوئيل : الملك الجبار : وحزقيال رأي باب : دخل فيه رب الارباب : وختم الباب مهاب : عالي المقدار

cells.english: Highly exalted are you: and your Son Jesus: when He was born of you: the earth was adorned: And also Daniel: prophesied and said: I saw the high throne: highly exalted.
cells.enPhonics1: Alen howa qadrek: lean yasoo ebnek: lamma woled mennek: tazayanat el-aktar: wa aydan Danial: tanaba Haytho qal: raayto el-korsy el-al: aleya el meqdar.
cells.arabic: عال هو قدرك : لإن يسوع ابنك : لما ولد منك : تزينت الاقطار : وايضا دانيال : تنبأ حيث قال : رأيت الكرسي العال : عالي المقدار

cells.english: In the firmaments high I saw: one like the Son of Man: who has dominion: over all the earth: He is the Lord of Hosts: around Him are the ranks: thousands and myriads: glorifying in reverence.
cells.enPhonics1: Nazarto fok el-arkan: shebh ebn el-ensan: wa laho al-soltan: ala kol el aqtar: wa howa rabo el-qowat: wa men Hawloh taghamat: oloof wa rabawat: be ezamen wa waqar.
cells.arabic: نظرت فوق الأركان : شبه ابن الانسان : وله السلطان : علي كل الأقطار : وهو رب القوات : ومن حوله طغمات: الوف وربوات : بعظم ووقار

cells.english: O daughter of Joachim: you are exalted above: the Cherubim and Seraphim: and all righteous fathers: The Lord was born from you: and David praises you: with his harp he sings: playing its ten strings.
cells.enPhonics1: Ya ebnat Yowaqim: foqt el-karoubim: aydan el-serafaim: wa kol el-aba el-abrar: menky ga el-mawlood: al-rab el-mabood: yamdaH fiki Dawood: bel-asharat awtar.
cells.arabic: ياابنة يواقيم : فقت الكروبيم : وايضا السرافيم : وكل الاباء الابرار : منك جاء المولود : الرب المعبود: يمدح فيك داود : بالعشرة أوتار

cells.english: The sound of the first string: is in honor of your name: the Virgin will carry: the Almighty King: And with the second string: David rejoices: chanting with hymns: while playing his harp.
cells.enPhonics1: El-watar el-awal: qawlon mobagal: wel-adra taHbal: bel-malek el-gabar: el-watar el-thany: Dawood bil-tahany: yoratel bel-alHan: ma darb el-qithar.
cells.arabic: الوتر الاول : قول مبجل : والعذراء تحبل: بالملك الجبار : الوتر الثاني : داود بالتهاني : و يرتل بالالحان : مع ضرب القيثار

cells.english: And the third O daughter: because you were faithful: you were filled with light: and the Lord chose you: The fourth string is sounded: so that all can hear: of her who is praised: all over the world.
cells.enPhonics1: Wel-thaleth ya ibna: anty motamana: bel-noor moshtamala: wal-rabo laky ekhtar: el-watar el-rabe: esghy ya same: za qawlon shae: fi kol el-aqtar.
cells.arabic: الثالث يا ابنة : أنت مؤتمنة : بالنورمشتملة : والرب لك إختار : الوتر الرابع : اصغ يا سامع : ذا قول شائع : في كل الاقطار

cells.english: The fifth is a sign of hope: as a dove she appears: with Ophir gold: upon her shoulders: With the sixth he sung: praises I will not hide: but I will praise with him: and proclaim to all.
cells.enPhonics1: Wel-khames khabar: Hamama heya tazhar: bel-zahab el-asfar: ala menkabayha sar: wel-sades qal fih: qawlan ma akhfih: lakeny arweeh: wa osh-heraho eg-har.
cells.arabic: الخامس خبر : حمامة هي تظهر : بالذهب الاصفر : علي منكبيها صار : السادس قال فيه : قولاً ما أخفيه : لكني أرويه : واشهره أجهار

cells.english: With the seventh string he said: O mountain, of the High God: the High took flesh from you: without a doubt: And with the eighth he sang: to the Virgin Mary: the Great chose her: and crowned her with honor.
cells.enPhonics1: Wel-sabe ez qal: ya gabal Allah el-al: tagasad menky el-motaal: bela shak wala enkar: wel-thamen ranam: lel-adra Mariam: ekhtarha al-moazam: wa kallalha bel-fakhar.
cells.arabic: السابع اذ قال : يا جبل الله العال : تجسد منك المتعال : بلا شك ولا إنكار : والثامن رنم : للعذ را مريم : اختارها المعظم : وكللها بالفخار

cells.english: With the ninth string he said: from her will surely come: God her son: who sealed her virginity: With the tenth he sang: the Powerful God: in Zion he appeared: the dwelling of the righteous.
cells.enPhonics1: El-tase qal anha: yazhar Haqan menha: al-Elah wa howa ebnaha: wal-bokooreya fi Hefzen wa waqar: El-watar el-asher: Allah el-qader: fi Sehioun zaher: maskan el-abrar.
cells.arabic: التاسع قال عنها : يظهر حقا منها : الإله وهو إبنها : والبكورية في حفط ووقار : الوتر العاشر : الله القادر : في صهيون ظاهر : مسكن الأبرار

cells.english: There isn’t in all ages: anyone like you O Virgin: for you released the chains: and shame of Adam: O Lady of the creation: the pride of faith: your servant is in need: drowning because of sins.
cells.enPhonics1: Lam yowgad fi el-dahr: methlek ayatoha el-bekr, : leanek fakakty el-asr: an Adam wal-ar: ya sayedet el-akwan: ya fakhr el-eiman: ana abdek Hayran: gharek fil-awzar.
cells.arabic: لم يوجد في الدهر : مثلك أيتها البكر : لأنك فككت الاسر : عن آدم والعار : يا سيدة الأكوان : يا فخر الإيمان : عبدك حيران : غارق في الاوزار

cells.english: Intercede for me: do not leave your servant: Ask your son to save me: From the fire: For your intercession: is heard and accepted: and He defends from the attacks: of the adversary.
cells.enPhonics1: Alen howa qadrek: la tatroky abdek: qasdy men waladek: Toba wa esteghfar: Wel adra tashfa: Fe elodar agma: We heia ana tadfa: darabat el-ashrar.
cells.arabic: عالي هو قدرك : لا تتركي عبدك : قصدي من ولدك : توبة و أستغفار : و العذراء تشفع : في الحضار اجمع : و هي عنا تدفع : ضربات الاشرار

cells.english: Arise O poor one, and clothe yourself in faith: and say Amen Amen: for us she intercedes: The persistent servant: Will always praise her: For by his side that Day: The Lady of virgins shall be.
cells.enPhonics1: Qom enhad ya meskeen: wa elbes thob el-yaqeen, : wa qol amin amin: fa heya tashfa fil-hadreen: wal-nazem el-meskeen: madeHha fi kol Hin: maloh yom el-din: sewa sayedet el-abkar.
cells.arabic: قم وانهض يا مسكين : والبس ثوب اليقين : وقل امين امين : فهي تشفع في الحاضرين : و أنا الخاطي المسكين : مادحها في كل حين : مالي يوم الدين : سوي سيدة الابكار

english_title: Our Mother the Virgin, the Beloved of Us All

cells.english: Our mother the virgin,
The compassionate
The beloved of us all
Our helper when we call.
You are a model of purity
A pillar of virginity.
The mother of the merciful
Oh mother of the mighty Lord
Our mother the virgin,
The compassionate
The beloved of us all
Our helper when we call.
You bore the beloved Lord
Who redeemed us with His cross.
Intercede before the Lord
As we offer him our tears
Our mother the virgin,
The compassionate
The beloved of us all
Our helper when we call.
We see the Virgin our Mother
the beloved queen of our hearts
Always interceding for us
Lifting our prayers to the Lord
Our mother the virgin,
The compassionate
The beloved of us all
Our helper when we call.
You have performed miracles
Comforted us in trials
Joy to the broken you gave
And the afflicted you save
Our mother the virgin,
The compassionate
The beloved of us all
Our helper when we call.
My queen and the help of mankind
You have enlightened my mind
Our hearts please guide them
Remember us in heaven
Our mother the virgin,
The compassionate
The beloved of us all
Our helper when we call.

english_title: O Mary our Mother, You’re the Mother of our Lord

cells.english: O Mary our Mother,
you’re the Mother of our Lord. (x2)
Intercede on our behalf,
O the Intercessor of us all (x2)
O Mary our Mother (x2)
O Jesus Christ your Son,
receives all prayers from you. (x2)
O Mary, we love you;
We rejoice when we say your name. (x2)
O Mary our Mother (x2)

arabic_title: يا أم النور. يا فخر الأمة

cells.english: O Mother of light, the pride of nations,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya om al noor. Ya fakhr al ‘oma
cells.arabic: يا أم النور. يا فخر الأمة

cells.english: the beginning of joy, the treasure of grace,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya bad’ alseroor. Ya kanz al ne3ma
cells.arabic: يا بدء السرور. يا كنز النعمة

cells.english: the source of happiness, origin of mercy,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya ‘asl al7ebor. Ya ma3dan al ra7ma
cells.arabic: يا أصل الحبور. يا معدن الرحمة

cells.english: O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
The exalted, living, worshipped Lord,
honored you with perfection, O daughter of David,
and Gabriel visited you, with the promised mystery,
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
He granted you blessedness, by the descent of the Grace,
by a wondrous mystery, you bore the Word,
and He saved every grievous soul, from the bond of darkness,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Anqaz kol ka’eeb. Men deeq elzolma
cells.arabic: أنقذ كل كئيب من ضيق الظلمة

cells.english: O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
Hail to you, O rod of Aaron,
blessed are you, O daughter of Zion.
The righteous rejoice at your name,
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
Rejoice O Mary, O chosen bride,
O honored seed, and dome and tower,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya nasl mokarram. Qobba wa manara

cells.english: O exalted root, of all purity,
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
You became as the heavens, carrying the Holy One
Nobler than the powers and higher than the ranks
cells.arabic: أشرف من القوات عالية عن الطقوس

cells.english: We ask your intercessions before our Lord Jesus
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
We ask you O Virgin, O crown of Israel,
O joy of the martyrs, O origin of rejoicing.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya fara7 al shohada’. Ya asl altahleel
cells.arabic: يا فرح الشهداء. يا أصل التهليل

cells.english: Intercession and victory, before Emmanuel,
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.

english_title: O Mother of Light, O Beautiful One (Auto Translation)

cells.english: O Mother of Light, so beautiful
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya om el noor ya gameela

cells.english: O Virgin pure and noble
O daughter of David, so true
O Mother of our God, our guide (2)
Your light glows like a lamp
After night, your dawn rises
Filling the world with joy
Scattering roses around us (2)
The angel came with greetings
He saluted and blessed you
Saying, 'God is with you'
You’ll bear our Redeemer (2)
The angel brought glad tidings
You’re chosen, he declared
A beacon for the world
Your Son’s light shines on us (2)
We praise you, lighting candles
We honor you, O Mother of Light
You’re the fountain of grace
Pouring blessings upon us (2)

english_title: O Mother Of Meekness, O Beautiful Tune
arabic_title: يا أم الوداعة يا لحن الجمال

cells.english: O mother of meekness, O beautiful tune
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya om el wada3a ya la7n el gamal
cells.arabic: يا أم الوداعة يا لحن الجمال

cells.english: We call upon you O bright hope
We looked on earth and on mountains
We found no one like you in purity (2)
O Virgin, your light overshone the sun
cells.arabic: يا عدرا دا نورك غطى ع الشموس

cells.english: The Lord called you O beautiful bride (2)
With grace O Mary, you conceived the Holy One
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Bel ne3ma ya Mariam 7amalt’el kod os

cells.english: With your hands, you carried Savior of the world
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Web edeky shelty khalas el nefos

cells.english: O mother of meekness, O beautiful tune
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya om el wada3a ya la7n el gamal
cells.arabic: يا أم الوداعة يا لحن الجمال

cells.english: We call upon you O bright hope
We looked on earth and on mountains
We found no one like you in purity (2)
The whole world, young and old
Ask your intercession, O mother of the Almighty (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Beyotlob shafa3tek ya om el kadeer (2)

cells.english: With your passion you healed the sick and opened the eyes of the blind
Your soul is a lampstand and your heart is gentle
cells.enPhonicsSongs: De ro7ek manara we albek kebeer

cells.english: O mother of meekness, O beautiful tune
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya om el wada3a ya la7n el gamal
cells.arabic: يا أم الوداعة يا لحن الجمال

cells.english: We call upon you O bright hope
We looked on earth and on mountains
We found no one like you in purity (2)
Who can renew my faith but you,
Bless my life and give me peace (2)
Your picture is always in my heart
cells.enPhonicsSongs: De sortek fe alby sakna men zaman
cells.arabic: دي صورتك في قلبي ساكنة من زمان

cells.english: Your love fills my body and soul
cells.enPhonicsSongs: We 7obek fe ro7y wef damy kaman
cells.arabic: وحبك في روحي وفي دمي كمان

cells.english: O mother of meekness, O beautiful tune
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya om el wada3a ya la7n el gamal
cells.arabic: يا أم الوداعة يا لحن الجمال

cells.english: We call upon you O bright hope
We looked on earth and on mountains
We found no one like you in purity (2)
The Father looked from heaven
Did not find anyone like you among women (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Lam yaged ka’shabahek Mariam fel nesa (2)
cells.arabic: لم يجد كشبهك مريم في النساء (2)

cells.english: He sent His only Begotten to be born of you
Peace on earth and glory in the highest
cells.arabic: في الأرض سالما مجدا في العالء

cells.english: O mother of meekness, O beautiful tune
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Ya om el wada3a ya la7n el gamal
cells.arabic: يا أم الوداعة يا لحن الجمال

cells.english: We call upon you O bright hope
We looked on earth and on mountains
We found no one like you in purity (2)
O seeker to meet Jesus
Forget your hanger and thirst
Your food is the bread of life
And you´ll drink from his wounded side
You traveller forget the past
And go steadfast in the path
If you suffer on the road
Remember for you he died
The trumpet will be heard soon
With happiness and sound of joy
A great feast above the clouds
And a crown for the watchful
He´ll prepare a place for you
He is always waiting for you
His heart is longing for you
Blessed are you if you are prepared
You are a part in Jesus Christ
You who lives among the rocks
Have no fear from all dangers
You´re protected by the Lord
O seeker to meet Jesus
Forget your hanger and thirst
Your food is the bread of life
And you´ll drink from his wounded side
O tell me John, O tell me, about His shining face,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: Khaberny ya Yohanna 3an sadrehi el hanan
cells.arabic: خبرني يا يوحنا عن صدره الحنان

cells.english: And how you were so lucky, on His chest your head laid?
cells.enPhonicsSongs: we izay kont bitesned rasak we fe ay makan
cells.arabic: و ازاي كنت تسند راسك و في أي مكان

cells.english: Please answer me and tell me, John answered me and said: (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: gawebny yalla we olly, rad yohanna we al (2)
cells.arabic: جاوبني يلا و قوللي رد يوحنا و قال (2)

cells.english: He called me the beloved, In His eyes I found grace,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: dah sadroh wasa3 wasa3 yesa3y kol el nas
cells.arabic: ده صدره واسع واسع يساع كل الناس

cells.english: He said Mary is your mother; I took her to my place.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: we alboh nabed nabed koloh mahaba we ihsas
cells.arabic: و قلبه نابض نابض كله نحبه و إحساس

cells.english: His heart is ever beating, with love for the human race. (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: mish la'iy zay sadroh ateke' 3aleh fe aman (2)
cells.arabic: مش لاقي زي صدره اتكئ عليه في أمان (2)

cells.english: And dear Peter please tell me, about the rock of faith,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: We inta ya Botros khaberny 3an sakhret el eeman
cells.arabic: وأنت يا بطرس كلمني عن صخرة الإيمان

cells.english: And how you were appointed, a pillar in His Church?
cells.enPhonicsSongs: we izay el rab akamak min a3madet el bonyan
cells.arabic: وكيف الرب اقامك من أعمدة البنيان

cells.english: Please answer me and tell me, Peter answered and said: (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: gawebny yalla we olly, rad botros we al (2)
cells.arabic: جاوبني يلا و قوللي رد بطرس و قال (2)

cells.english: Despite all my denials, His Love for me was great,
cells.enPhonicsSongs: dah akamny fe kinestoh, raghm kol el inkar
cells.arabic: ده أقامني في كنيسته رغم كل الإنكار

cells.english: And while I was so bitter, my sins He did erase.
cells.enPhonicsSongs: we dameny le 3arostoh fy mahfal el abrar
cells.arabic: و ضمني لعروسته في محفل الأبرار

cells.english: His heart is so forgiving, for sinners everywhere. (2)
cells.enPhonicsSongs: mish la'iy zayoh sakhra tisnedny fe kol zaman (2)
cells.arabic: مش لاقي زيه صخرة تسندني في كل زمان (2)

cells.english: Can you Andrew please tell me, how five small loaves of bread,
And two fish be sufficient, over five thousand fed?
Please answer me and tell me, Andrew answered and said: (2)
It's not really any figure, that means anything to THE LORD,
His prayer to THE FATHER, on a lunch willingly brought,

our greatest hope,

cells.english: (You reach to me with tender care
And guide my hand to safety’s shore) (2)
O Virgin, O Virgin, Mother of God (2)

audio_file: Ya 3adra Ya Om Elnoor Ezhari Leena 3ala Tool

cells.english: O Mary mother of light
Appear to us shine so bright (x2)
O Virgin for us intercede
Pray for us unceasingly
Come and appear
Shining here
And fill the world with your incense
O Virgin for us intercede
Pray for us unceasingly
Your light brings joy everywhere
A mother looking down with care
Your incense beauty to behold
You bore the ever-burning coal
Comfort us o pure dove (x3)
Come and appear
Shining here
And fill the world with your incense
O Virgin for us intercede
Pray for us unceasingly
O Mary the Mother of God
Look to us sinners so flawed
Ask of God to forgive us
And ask Him to always protect us
Your prayers are dear to Him (x3)
Come and appear
Shining here
And fill the world with your incense
O Virgin for us intercede
Pray for us unceasingly
Emmanuel came to us with you
Our joy and our comfort too
His heart full of love filled us too
His perfect peace granted to us
He redeemed us on the cross (x3)
Come and appear
Shining here
And fill the world with your incense
O Virgin for us intercede
Pray for us unceasingly

cells.english: You are our faithful advocate
You intercede for us with haste
You are highly ranked in the heavens
With endless mercy and compassion
Your praise is sweeter than all songs
For none other do our hearts long
You are our faithful advocate
You intercede for us with haste
Beside your light, the moon and sun
Are not as bright, o shining one
He who despises the help of Mary
Trouble befalls him speedily
You are our faithful advocate
You intercede for us with haste
Gabriel came with glad tidings
To Nazareth greetings he brings
Rejoice o you the graceful one
The earthly throne for the Son
You are our faithful advocate
You intercede for us with haste
The Lord of the heaven and earth
Revealed mysteries through His birth
The long awaited Savior came
Took flesh from you to bear our shame
You are our faithful advocate
You intercede for us with haste
The world receives the Lord’s mercy
Through your help and advocacy
O full of grace, Who protects all
That find refuge under your cloak
You are our faithful advocate
You intercede for us with haste
The Most High power came upon you
Overshadowed you in truth
The Holy Spirit came down to you
You bore the Christ for us in truth
You are our faithful advocate
You intercede for us with haste
My intercessor and precious one
With your help my battles are won
May you always intercede
Without your aid, who can find mercy?
You are our faithful advocate
You intercede for us with haste
